name: P.O.E.S.
description:
This game was made by a hobbyist in 72~ hours for the SA Game Jam 2021

LORE:

A desperate scientist on the run from debt collectors discovers an abandoned storage facility deep in the savanna full of ancient relics.

Not wanting to risk going in himself, he sends a robot armed with the experimental P.O.E.S. (Piercing orb emitting system). 

This robot has been ordered to smash all the crates in the facility with the P.O.E.S. in order to find these ancient relics and escape before the ancient building collapses . 

If he pulls this off, the scientist will be able to pay off the debt collectors before they send any  hitmen after him.

Controls:

W, A, S, D - movement

Space - jump

Left Mouse Button - fire the P.O.E.S.

Credits:

SFX - created in sfxr or obtained from Freesound.org

Font - obtained from here: https://www.fontspace.com/press-start-2p-font-f11591

Everything else - created in various programs by me
